name: Lumberjackin' It
description:
Fellow woodsmen! Grab your axe and brush your beard! The frantic endless runner, Lumberjack'n is here!

Chop down useless trees, lots of 'em!

Leafy green hardwood in your way? Chop it down.

Little sapling trying to grow? Chop it down.

Bound over giant boulders…you can't chop those.

Diamonds! Diamonds! Diamonds!

Like rewards? Become a chopping master and unlock crazy characters!

Play now, and release your inner Lumberjack!

Features:

Beautiful pixelated world

Randomly generated levels

Test your reflexes and get the highest score

Action packed gameplay mechanics

Fun soundtrack
